Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPC

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A player object, which stored all of the user's in game information
    Author:
    Goldberg

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String token,
              int tokenSize)
        A constructor for a Player
        Parameters:
        name - The Player's name
        token - The token chosen by the user for the Player
        tokenSize - The Display generated tokenSize

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              int wallet,
              int position,
              int numberOfJailCards,
              boolean inJail,
              int turnsLeftInJail,
              boolean inDebt,
              int debt,
              java.lang.String token,
              int tokenSize)
        Parameters:
        name - The Player's name
        wallet - The Player's balance
        position - The Player's position on the board
        numberOfJailCards - The Player's number of get out of jail free cards
        inJail - If the player is in jail
        turnsLeftInJail - The number of turns the player has left in jail (Can be 0)
        inDebt - If the player is in debt
        debt - The Player's debt (Can be 0)
        token - The token chosen by the user for the Player
        tokenSize - The Display generated tokenSize

      • decreaseJail

        public void decreaseJail(boolean release)
        Handles the jail sentence, decreasing it until the sentence is done. OR releasing the player if there is a TRUE release boolean
        Parameters:
        release - If the user should be freed immediately

      • hasJailCard
